sectiondiv.p: To search for a managed object by FDN, input the desired FDN into the search field and click the search button. The ID, name and type of the FDN will be shown in a table below.

To search for managed objects by type, input the desired type, prefixed by "types/" into the search field and click the search button, for example "types/EUtranCellFDD". The ID, name and type of the objects will be shown in a table below.
To save a collection from a search, click "Save as...". Enter a Collection name, select the "Collection" radio button and click "Save". The collection info will be displayed at the top of the page.
To locate a collection, the user can click on the collection name in the sidebar. This will display the saved collection.
To save your search query, click "Save as...". Enter a saved search name, select the "Saved Search" radio button and click "Save". The saved search info will be displayed at the top of the page.
To locate a saved search, the user can click on the saved search name in the sidebar. This will display the saved search details and populate the search bar with the saved query.
